ssl_key.description: The path to the client private key.

master_auto_position.description: does the host uses GTID based replication or not

login_user.description: The username used to authenticate with.

connect_timeout.description: The connection timeout when connecting to the MySQL server.

config_file.description: Specify a config file from which user and password are to be read.

login_unix_socket.description: The path to a Unix domain socket for local connections.

login_password.description: The password used to authenticate with.

login_port.description: Port of the MySQL server. Requires I(login_host) be defined as other then localhost if login_port is used.

ssl_cert.description: The path to a client public key certificate.

ssl_ca.description: The path to a Certificate Authority (CA) certificate. This option, if used, must specify the same certificate as used by the server.

mode.description: module operating mode. Could be getslave (SHOW SLAVE STATUS), getmaster (SHOW MASTER STATUS), changemaster (CHANGE MASTER TO), startslave (START SLAVE), stopslave (STOP SLAVE), resetslave (RESET SLAVE), resetslaveall (RESET SLAVE ALL)
